gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pistons 113, Hornets 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pistons outscored the Hornets 24-14 in the fourth quarter and ended the game on a 13-2 run to win 113-106. Bojan Bogdanovic tallied his third 30-point game of the year with 34 points (5-10 3PT), four rebounds, and four assists, as Jalen Duren added 14 points and eight rebounds for Detroit. Brandon Miller tallied 23 points, seven rebounds, and four assists with Nick Richards adding a career-high 21 points, along with 10 rebounds for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Pistons improve to 5-39 as the Hornets move to 10-32.
